body_html:
I think there is value in adding meshgrid into ATen.
And it's unfortunate that there is a difference in behaviour between torch.repeat and numpy.repeat, but I haven't used numpy.repeat much and I think the behaviour of torch.repeat is quite useful. Not sure what to do there, but I'm not seeing many use-cases of repeat that couldn't be achieved with advanced indexing (even though creating the indices would be slightly tricky, but doable without issues in python)
